content: 30 single_crochet 6 *1sc in first four stitches 2 in next* repeat for remainder of round 36 single_crochet 7 *1sc in first five stitches 2 in next* repeat for remainder of round 42 single_crochet 8 *1sc in first six stitches 2 in next* repeat for remainder of round 48 single_crochet 9 *1sc in first seven stitches 2 in next* repeat for remainder of round 54 single_crochet 10 *1sc in first eight stitches 2 in next* repeat for remainder of round 60 single_crochet 11 *1sc in first nine stitches 2 in next* repeat for remainder of round 66 single_crochet 12 *1sc in first ten stitches 2 in next* repeat for remainder of round 72 single_crochet 13 *1sc in first eleven stitches 2 in next* repeat for remainder of round 78 single_crochet 14 *1sc in first twelve stitches 2 in next* repeat for remainder of round 84 single_crochet 15 *1sc in first thirteen stitches 2 in next* repeat for remainder of round 90 single_crochet 16 *1sc in first fourteen stitches 2 in next* repeat for remainder of round 96 single_crochet 17 *1sc in first fifteen stitches 2 in next* repeat for remainder of round 102 single_crochet 18 slip-stitch in next stitch or two to smooth out circle and fasten_off front proceed as for back starting with orange yarn making the following colour changes nose 1 and 2 orange 6-12 stitches 3 orange 14 white 4 18 single_crochet 4 w 14 o 4 w 6 24 single_crochet 5 w 19 o 3 w 8 30 single_crochet 1 if you are not familiar with the magic loop method for beginning a round project you may simply chain 2 then make 6 single_crochet in the second stitch from hook to begin nose and eyes 6 w 7 black 3 w 6 b 3 w 4 o 3 w 10 36 single_crochet 7 w 8 b 4 w 6 b 4 w 6 o 2 w 12 42 single_crochet 8 w 10 b 3 w 8 b 4 w 8 o 1 w 14 48 single_crochet 9 -10 white 54-60 single_crochet smile 11 w 3 b 3 w 39 b 3 w 3 b 3 w 3 b 3 w 3 b 3 66 single_crochet 12 w 3 b 3 w 43 b 3 w 3 b 3 w 4 b 3 w 3 b3 w 1 72 single_crochet 13 through 18 white 78 through to 102 stitches finishing weave in ends attach white yarn through both pieces at once with a slip-stitch then pausing above the snowman s eye to add a loop chain 8 then slip-stitch it to rejoin *1sc in first sixteen stitches 2 in next* repeat for remainder of round 108 single_crochet weave in remaining ends and block lightly please send questions or comments to tweedlebug on ravelry
